name: Adrift Program
description:
"Supply energy to many spaceships in this small, chill resource and time management game.

A Cooked-Like, if you will!"




Handle machinery and energizing items as Bobby, a spaceship engineer, in this short game, inspired by Overcooked!
After a long development time, this game proudly sports polished pixel animations and orchestra-chiptune hybrids.

Controls (Keyboard/gamepad):

WASD/Arrows/Stick/D-pad to move.
Space/Enter/E/Action Buttons to interact with objects.

Credits:

Art: Blawnode, KingKelpo.

Code: redsti, Blawnode, Nazsgull (Prototyping).
Music: NoStereo.
SFX: sound_digitator.

Made with Unity 2020.3.17f1 and FMod 2.01.11.
